snippet: Nadja Drygalla’s relationship with a man known for his extreme right-wing political activities had made her Olympics story a cautionary tale.
abstract: Nadja Drygalla, rower on the German Olympic team, volunteers to leave the Olympic Village after discussion with officials about boyfriend Michael Fischer's extreme right-wing political activities; Drygalla, although she left quietly, has become the focus of a national debate.
lead_paragraph: Nadja Drygalla’s relationship with a man known for his extreme right-wing political activities had made her Olympics story a cautionary tale.

headline.seo: Germany’s Olympics Talk Centers on Rower’s Boyfriend
headline.main: In Germany, Talk of the Olympics Centers on a Rower’s Choice of Boyfriend
headline.print_headline: In Germany, Talk of the Olympics Centers on a Rower’s Choice of a Boyfriend
